text:
Heh, did you pass by that shopping street area?
My house is near there.

That area has changed too, right?
All the shops are closed?

But when I met the owner of the shop I used to frequent
the other day, he hadn't changed at all. It was surprising.

That person has been dressing the same since I was a kid.
It's interesting how some things change while others don't, isn't it?

Ah, sorry for keeping you in the conversation.
It's about to start, so let's move...
The atmosphere is really something, huh...!
